header.title: Amathuluzi eSalatiso OHS
intro.title: Ukuphepha Kwezokwakha
intro.description: Qinisekisa ukuthobela imithetho yezokwakha ngezinsiza ze-Salatiso OHS. Izinsiza zethu zisiza ukuphatha ingozi, ukuthobela imithetho, nokuvikela abasebenzi esizeni, zisebenzisa izindlela ezingcono kakhulu ezichazwe ku-"Ukuphepha Kuqala: Okubalulekile Kwezinhlelo ze-OHS."
legal_obligations.client.title: Izibopho Zeklayenti
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Umthetho Wokwakha 5(1)(a): Lungiselela ukuhlola ingozi eyisisekelo (BRA) echaza izingozi zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Umthetho Wokwakha 5(1)(b): Nikeza incazelo yezempilo nokuphepha echaza izidingo ezikhethekile zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Umthetho Wokwakha 5(1)(l): Gunyaza uhlelo lwezempilo nokuphepha lwekhontraktha ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Izibopho Zekhontraktha
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Umthetho Wokwakha 7(1)(a): Thuthukisa uhlelo lwezempilo nokuphepha olusekelwe encazelweni yeklayenti.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Umthetho Wokwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina ifayela lezempilo nokuphepha esizeni elinazo zonke izincwadi ezidingekayo.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Umthetho Wokwakha 9: Qhuba ukuhlola ingozi kanye nokuchazwa kwengozi (HIRAs) ngokukhethekile.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Izibopho Zochwepheshe be-H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Umthetho Wokwakha 5(5): Ama-ejenti (PrCHSA) aphatha i-H&S egameni leklayenti, eqinisekisa ukuthobela.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Umthetho Wokwakha 8(5): Amagosa (CHSO) asiza abakhontraktha ekusebenziseni nasekuqapheliseni izinhlelo ze-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Imihlahlandlela ye-SACPCMP: Kufanele agcine ubhaliso kanye nezidingo ze-CPD kwindima yobungcweti.
wizard.step_0: Sicela ukhethe isenzo ukuze uqale inqubo.
wizard.step_1.title: Isinyathelo 1 kwezingu-9: Ufuna Ukwenza Ntoni?
wizard.step_1.label: Khetha Amadokhumenti Ozowahlanganisa (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
wizard.step_1.error: Sicela ukhethe okungenani idokhumenti eyodwa ozoyihlanganisa.
wizard.step_2.title: Isinyathelo 2 kwezingu-9: Imininingwane Yeklayenti
wizard.step_3.title: Isinyathelo 3 kwezingu-9: Ingabe Ikhontraktha Iqashiwe?
wizard.step_4.title: Isinyathelo 4 kwezingu-9: Imininingwane Yekhontraktha
wizard.step_5.title: Isinyathelo 5 kwezingu-9: Imininingwane Yeprojekthi
wizard.step_6.title: Isinyathelo 6 kwezingu-9: Umkhawulo Weprojekthi
wizard.step_7.title: Isinyathelo 7 kwezingu-9: Ihlanganiswe Ngu
wizard.step_8.title: Isinyathelo 8 kwezingu-9: Ihlanganiselwe
wizard.step_8.specify_error: Sicela uchaze ukuthi idokhumenti ihlanganiselwe bani.
wizard.step_9.title: Isinyathelo 9 kwezingu-9: Buyekeza kanye Nokufaka Esikhwameni
wizard.step_9.description: Buyekeza izinto ozikhethile futhi ufake amadokhumenti esikhwameni sakho ukuze uqedele.
cart.title: Isikhwama Sakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo Yereferensi Ye-invoyisi: (Ivumelekile izinsuku eziyi-7. Bhalisa ukuze ugcine unomphela!)
resources.title: Xhumana Nochwepheshe Abavunyelwe Be-H&S
resources.description: Udinga usizo lochwepheshe? Xhumana nochwepheshe abavunyelwe ngezidingo zeprojekthi yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, I-Ejenti ye-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo Yobhaliso: PR12345 - Uxhumana: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Isikhulu se-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Inombolo Yobhaliso: CHSO67890 - Uxhumana: john.smith@example.com
footer.copyright: © 2025 Amathuluzi eSalatiso OHS. Wonke Amalungelo Agodliwe.
footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Uhlaziyekile
chatbot.response: Ngilapha ukukusiza! Ukuze uthole iseluleko esinemininingwane se-OHS, sicela uxhumane nochwepheshe.
sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 Ukuthobela kwe-OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Qala ngokukhetha isevisi ukuze uqinisekise ukuthobela uMthetho wezempilo nokuphepha emsebenzini.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Inyaniso Emnandi: Ngabe uyazi ukuthi amadokhumenti e-OHS afanele anganciphisa izehlakalo emsebenzini ngamaphesenti angama-30? Masifikeleke!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_1.description: Umthetho wokwakha 5(1)(b) udinga incazelo yezempilo nokuphepha kuzo zonke izinhlelo, kuyilapho i-7(1)(b) idinga ifayela le-H&S.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Inyaniso Emnandi: Incazelo ye-H&S eqinile inganciphisa izingozi ngamaphesenti angama-30%! Ifana nesihlangu sokuphepha seprojekthi yakho.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_2.description: Umthetho wokwakha 5: Amaklayenti kufanele anike incazelo yezempilo nokuphepha futhi aqinisekise ukuthobela kwabakhontraktha.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Inyaniso Emnandi: Amaklayenti agcina ubhaliso lwe-COIDA bangagwema izinhlawulo ezinkulu—gcina le nombolo iseduze!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_3.description: Umthetho wokwakha 7(1)(a): Abakhontraktha kufanele bathuthukise uhlelo lwezempilo nokuphepha olusekelwe encazelweni yeklayenti.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Inyaniso Emnandi: Ukuqasha ikhontraktha kusenesikhathi kungasheshisa ukuthobela—ukusebenzisana kwenza iphupho lokuphepha lisebenze!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_4.description: Umthetho wokwakha 7(1)(b): Abakhontraktha kufanele bagcine ifayela lezempilo nokuphepha esizeni elinazo zonke izincwadi ezidingekayo.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Inyaniso Emnandi: Ukuba nemininingwane yokuxhumana yekhontraktha ilungile kungasindisa usuku ngesikhathi sezimo eziphuthumayo—hlala uxhumekile!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_5.description: Umthetho wokwakha 3(1): Imvume iyadingeka kwezinhlelo ezingaphezulu kwe-R40,000 noma ezihlala izinsuku ezingaphezulu kwe-180.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Inyaniso Emnandi: Amakheli esiza acacile asiza abasebenzi bezimo eziphuthumayo bakuthole ngokushesha—ungavumeli iphutha lokuchwetheza liqede usizo!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_6.description: Umthetho wokwakha 9: Ukuhlola ingozi kanye nokuchazwa kwengozi (HIRAs) ngokukhethekile kuyadingeka kuyo yonke imisebenzi.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Inyaniso Emnandi: Kubona imisebenzi enobungozi kusenesikhathi kunganciphisa izingozi ngamaphesenti angama-25%—ifana nokunika iprojekthi yakho amandla okuphepha!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_7.description: Imihlahlandlela ye-SACPCMP: Ama-CHSO kanye nama-PrCHSA kufanele agcine ubhaliso kanye nezidingo ze-CPD ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Inyaniso Emnandi: Uchwepheshe ovunyiweyo we-SACPCMP anganciphisa izingozi zomthetho kakhulu—i-MVP yokuphepha yeprojekthi yakho!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_8.description: Umthetho wokwakha 5(1)(l): Amaklayenti kufanele avume uhlelo lwe-H&S lwekhontraktha ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Inyaniso Emnandi: Ukuxanduva okucacile kumadokhumenti kungakhulisa ukucaca kweprojekthi—wonke umuntu uyazi indima yakhe!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_9.description: Umthetho Wezempilo Nokuphepha Emsebenzini: Amadokhumenti afanele aqinisekisa ukuthobela futhi avikele bonke abathintekayo.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Inyaniso Emnandi: Isikhwama sakho yithuluzi lakho lokuphepha—idokhumenti ngayinye oyifakayo yenza iprojekthi yakho iphephe kakhudlwana!
training.title: Ukuqeqeshwa Okuphelele Kwasemsebenzini
training.description: Hlola izinhlelo zethu zokuqeqeshwa ezisebenzayo ukuze uqinisekise ukuthobela imithetho ye-OHS yaseNingizimu Afrika futhi ukhuthaze indawo yokusebenza ephephile. Khetha ukuqeqeshwa ngesandla, ngesigaba, noma usebenzise isiqondisi sethu ukuze uthole izincomo ezisekelwe embonini yakho, izethameli ezikhethiwe, kanye nendawo.
training.wizard.start: Sicela ukhethe inketho ukuze uqale inqubo yesincomo sokuqeqeshwa.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Isinyathelo 1 kwezingu-5: Khetha Umkhakha Wakho
training.wizard.step_1.label: Umkhakha:
training.wizard.step_2.title: Isinyathelo 2 kwezingu-5: Khetha Izethameli Ezikhethiwe
training.wizard.step_2.label: Izethameli Ezikhethiwe (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
training.wizard.step_2.option_emergency_: Iqembu Lezimo Eziphuthumayo (Abasizi Bokuqala, Abacimi Bomlilo)
training.wizard.step_3.title: Isinyathelo 3 kwezingu-5: Chaza Indawo Yakho
training.wizard.step_4.title: Isinyathelo 4 kwezingu-5: Imibandela Eyengeziwe
training.wizard.step_5.title: Isinyathelo 5 kwezingu-5: Buyekeza Ukuqeqeshwa Okunconyiwe
training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe kulokho okufakile, nazi izinhlelo zokuqeqeshwa ezinconyiwe. Khetha lezo ofuna ukuzifaka esikhwameni sakho.
training.cart.title: Isikhwama Sakho Sokuqeqeshwa
training.cart.customization.title: Lungisa Izinto Zakho Zokuqeqeshwa
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Sicela ufake inombolo yocingo yezimo eziphuthumayo evumelekile (isb., +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Ihlanganiswe Ngu
training.cart.training_type.title: Indlela Yokulethwa Kokuqeqeshwa
training.cart.training_type.label: Khetha Indlela Yokulethwa:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Isitatimende se-SafetyHelp: Izinto zokuqeqeshwa ezinikeziwe zenzelwe izinhloso zokwazisa kuphela futhi azifaki iseluleko sobungcweti. Ukuze uthole izisombululo ze-OHS ezilungiselelwe wena, xhumana ne-SafetyHelp ku-support@safetyhelp.co.za noma uvakashele Ikhasi Lokuxhumana.
training.checkout.success: Ukukhokha kuphumelele! Izinto zakho zokuqeqeshwa zikhiqiziwe. Landa ama-PDF akho ngezansi. Ukuqeqeshwa kwe-inthanethi, amakhodi okungena athunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyili.
training.providers.title: Abanikezeli Bokuqeqeshwa Abavunyelwe
training.providers.description: Udinga ukuqeqeshwa mathupha? Xhumana nabanikezeli bokuqeqeshwa abavunyelwe ngezidingo zakho.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - Ivunyelwe yi-SETA - Igxile Kusizo Lokuqala, Ukulwa Nomlilo - Uxhumana: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - Ibhaliswe kwi-SACPCMP - Igxile Ekuphepheni Kwezokwakha - Uxhumana: training@safeskills.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Thenga Incwadi Yokuqeqeshwa Engalungiswa
training.manual.purchase.description: Thola incwadi yokuqeqeshwa ephelele elungiselelwe inkampani yakho, ehlanganisa izidingo zomthetho, okuqukethwe okukhethekile kwenkampani ngokusekelwe kuphrofayili yengozi yakho, kanye nezingcaphuno ezivela kubanikezeli bokuqeqeshwa abavunyelwe.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Chaza Iphrofayili Yengozi Yakho Yencwadi Yokuqeqeshwa
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Iphrofayili Yengozi:
training.selection_method.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho Yokuqeqeshwa
training.legal_fact.step_1: Inyaniso Yomthetho: Umthetho we-OHS Isigaba 8 udinga ukuthi abaqashi banikeze ukuqeqeshwa okulungiselelwe izingozi ezithile zendawo yokusebenza.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Inyaniso Emnandi: Ngabe uyazi ukuthi ukuqeqeshwa njalo kunganciphisa izehlakalo emsebenzini ngamaphesenti angama-30?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Inyaniso Yomthetho: Omasipala bendawo bangaba nemithetho ye-OHS ekhethekile ehlukile ethinta izidingo zokuqeqeshwa.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Inyaniso Emnandi: Izindawo zokusebenza ezinobungozi obukhulu njengeziza zokwakha zidinga ukuqeqeshwa kaningi ukuze zigcine izindinganiso zokuphepha.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Inyaniso Yomthetho: Umthetho we-OHS uyakuyala ukuqeqeshwa kwezindima ezithile njengabameleli be-SHE ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthobela.
